name: Lunch Time.
storyline: Are you looking for a new lunch-based point-and-click time management sim RPG. Well, here's one! If you enjoy eating lunch and the various activities associated with the time in which you are eating lunch, then this is the game for you! Gameplay includes: eating lunch, participating in the various activities associated with lunch time, and those are all your gameplay options. Enjoy!
summary: A short lunch-based point-and-click RPG for Playdate inspired by games such as The Stanley Parable, Disco Elysium, and late 90s/early 2000s edutainment.
